title: Pure Organic Certified Rosehip Seed Oil (30 ml/1.01 fl.oz)
description: Rosehip Seed Oil is used to help dry, irritated, and weathered skin. "Extra Virgin" means that the oil is of the highest quality and is produced as a result a single, simple pressing. Our product contains a naturally high amount of vitamin E (no extra vitamin added), and essential fatty acids that are highly beneficial to the skin. Rosehip oil improves the appearance of wrinkles, stretch marks and eczema scars. This super-fine oil absorbs instantly, allowing the skin to breathe while it goes to work to promote a soft, beautiful skin. Ideal for normal, dry, mature, sun-damaged, scarred and sensitive skin.. Apply just a few drops before sleeping. Rosehip oil is becoming popular with massage therapists for its skin softening properties, typically in dilution (10% recommended). External use only

title: Manuka Honey and Manuka Oil Skin Cream
description: Skin Clear (TM) Manuka Cream 80ml/2.7 fl.oz. Contains Manuka Honey and manuka oil to keep the skin looking clear and healthy. Formulated with organic aloe vera juice instead of water for increased hydration and soothing action. This new formula includes Kukuinut Oil, a traditional Hawaiian oil for moisturizing damaged skin. This Skin Clear Cream has a 74% organic content and 91% overall natural composition, and contains no parabens, artificial colorants or fragrances.Ideal for acne-prone skin, this cream will improve the appearance of blemished skin and promote skin elasticity through the action of manuka honey and other powerful natural moisturizers. Continuous use of this cream will restore the skin's natural moisture barrier, often damaged by acne and acne medications, and protect against further damage.
